about.title: About FreshBite
about.subtitle: Homemade frozen meals crafted with care, delivered to your door.
about.storyParagraph1: FreshBite was born from a simple idea: everyone deserves access to delicious, homemade meals without the time and effort of cooking from scratch every day.
about.storyParagraph2: We work with talented chefs who prepare each meal with the same care and attention you'd put into cooking for your own family. Every dish is made in small batches using premium, locally-sourced ingredients whenever possible.
about.storyParagraph3: Our meals are flash-frozen at peak freshness to lock in flavor and nutrients, then carefully packaged and delivered directly to your door. No preservatives, no shortcuts—just honest, homemade food.
about.featuresSubtitle: Quality, convenience, and care in every meal.
about.feature1Description: Every meal is crafted by experienced chefs who understand flavor, nutrition, and the art of home cooking.
about.feature2Description: We use only the finest ingredients, prepared with care and attention to detail in every step of the process.
about.feature3Description: Our meals are frozen at peak freshness to preserve flavor, texture, and nutritional value until you're ready to enjoy them.
about.feature4Description: Skip the grocery store and meal prep. We deliver fresh, frozen meals straight to your home, ready to heat and enjoy.
about.missionParagraph1: At FreshBite, we believe that good food should be accessible to everyone. Whether you're a busy professional, a parent juggling multiple responsibilities, or someone who simply loves great food but doesn't always have time to cook, we're here to make your life easier.
about.missionParagraph2: We're committed to providing you with meals that are not just convenient, but truly delicious and made with integrity. Every order is a promise of quality, freshness, and the comfort of homemade food.
about.ctaDescription: Browse our menu and discover your new favorite meals. Order 48 hours in advance for pickup.
